Laura Iara Silva Santos Xavier - 734661
bin

5. a) 101110 - 1101 = 00101110 + C2(00001101)

    0 00101110
  + 1 11110011
    ___________
    0 00100001

b) 101,1110 - 2,3(8) = 0101,1110 + C2(0010,1100)

    0 0101,1110
  + 1 1101,0100
   ______________
    0 0011,0010

c) 213(4) - F(16) = 00100111 + C2(00001111)

    0 00100111
  + 1 11110001
   ______________
    0 00011000

d) AC(16) - 1001011 = 10101100 + C2(01001011)

    0 10101100
  + 1 10110101
   _____________
    0 01100001

e) 34(10) - 2B(16) = 00100010 + C2(00101011)

    0 00100010
  + 1 11010101
  _____________    
    1 11110111 -> -1 = 1 11110110 -> 0 00001001
